name: UK_teaching_standards

description: The educational theory and practice of teaching.

description: The specific subjects taught in a classroom setting.

description: The strategies and techniques used to manage student behavior.

description: The process of creating lesson plans and organizing instructional materials.

description: The methods and tools used to evaluate student learning.

description: The practice of using numbers and symbols to solve problems.

name: English
description: The study of language, literature, and communication.

description: The study of the natural world and its phenomena.

name: History
description: The study of past events and their significance.

description: The study of the Earth's physical features and human populations.

name: Art
description: The creation of visual, auditory, or performance works.

name: Music
description: The study and practice of musical expression.

name: Physical_education
description: The promotion of physical fitness and well-being.

name: Computer_science
description: The study of computers and computational systems.

name: Foreign_languages
description: The study of languages other than one's native language.

name: Religious_education
description: The study of religious beliefs and practices.

name: Design_and_technology
description: The application of knowledge and skills to create products.

name: Citizenship

description: The study of human society and social relationships.

name: Psychology

name: Sociology
description: The study of human society and social behavior.

name: Economics

name: Business_studies
description: The study of how businesses operate and make decisions.

name: Politics
description: The study of government and political systems.

name: Philosophy
description: The study of fundamental questions about existence and knowledge.

name: Law
description: The study of rules and regulations within a society.

name: Media_studies
description: The study of mass communication and media industries.

name: Health_and_social_care
description: The study of health, social services, and well-being.

description: The study of non-living natural objects and forces.

name: Biology
description: The study of living organisms and their interactions.

name: Chemistry
description: The study of the composition and properties of substances.

name: Physics
description: The study of matter, energy, and the interactions between them.

name: Environmental_science
description: The study of the natural environment and its processes.

name: Astronomy
description: The study of celestial objects and phenomena.

name: Geology
description: The study of the Earth's solid materials and structures.

name: Meteorology
description: The study of the Earth's atmosphere and weather.

name: Anthropology
description: The study of human societies and cultures.

name: Archaeology

name: Criminology
description: The study of crime, criminals, and criminal behavior.

name: Education

name: Gender_studies
description: The study of gender identity and social roles.

name: Philology

name: Theology

name: Visual_arts

name: Performing_arts
